body:
Heyall! I'd like to simulate insulated external thermal mass. Which LB+HB components are useful for doing that? Any example file/s would be very welcome. 
Best,
Aryan

replies.body:
Hi Aryan,

I think you should take a look at this tutorial from Chris.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OWeoXlQyPxg](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OWeoXlQyPxg)

He explains how to create custom constructions. Actually all the videos are pretty nice in that series

hey Eduard, thanks for your reply. yes, Chris's tutorials are very helpful. there are some specific geometrical problems with my model of thermal mass in detail. i'm trying to solve it but maybe later i need to ask another question concerning that.
